prompt: Create a profile page with a futuristic theme, featuring a hexagonal profile picture (140px across) at the top center with a glowing blue outline. The user's name should be in bold cyan text (font size 30), and the email in light blue (font size 16). Place three action buttons (Edit Profile, Settings, Logout) in a horizontal arc below, each with a transparent background, cyan border, and cyan text. Use a dark blue background (#0A1C2B) with padding (30px). Center the content vertically and add a subtle glow effect to the buttons.
